title: Horsepower Looking for Jungle & Top. Semi-Serious. High Plat +

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
Howdy.

Horsepower is currently looking for a dedicated Top & Jungler ready for next season.
The aim is to practice leisurely during pre-season then attempt Challenger 5's while entering some OCE tournaments later down the line.


We're looking for someone that is:
-Communicates ( Mic + TS3 required)
-Not overly argumentative
-Doesn't tilt over 90°
-Has a decent champ pool for their role.
-Not an one trick pony
-Plat 3 +
-17 yrs old +

Once we get in contact we will trial you for a few games. Don't want lead anyone on too much so it will be minimal time for trialing. 

If you are interested add me in game: Navi
Cheers

replies.body: how can I be part of horsepower if i am only a 1 trick pony and you aren't pony friendly.

Hi I am interested and main at both roles preferably Jungle. Finished season in platinum 2. Had some ranked team experience looking to play serious. 20 Yr old jungle pool huge top pool expanding. Main lee sin renekton yasuo pantheon 

Add me if interested "Best Roy OCE"
